title: This has been the most useless, insincere, two-faced Parliament in our history
text:
Soon, MPs will have a deserved reckoning at the ballot box

It was billed as "Super Saturday" in Parliament, the moment when, finally, the Government would get Brexit over the line, allowing the public to move on from the political insanity that has captured the country.

In the event, the day turned out to be anything but super - unless you happen to be a rugby fan.

And speaking in rugby terms, today went roughly as follows. The Prime Minister picked up the ball which had fallen loose from the scrum, ran powerfully for 87 metres with opposition players bouncing off him. Yet just as he drove over the try line in the 79th minute to win the game, a member of his own team, Oliver Letwin, deliberately...
description: Soon, MPs will have a deserved reckoning at the ballot box
